On Mon, Nov 25, 2002 at 06:54:49PM +0000, Philip Trickett wrote:
> how much overhead does this add to your daily 'email reading'?

like i said, two emails in about 2 to 3 months.

> Now tell me, is there a way to stop them from forging the from: address
> to a nonexistent address at a domain you own and use actively? At the
> moment I am at 1200 bounces and counting!  Good job I'm on ADSL
> otherwise I would be throwing a fit...

yes, i whitelist the minimum required.

kevin
